snippet.title: The Time I Have Left - Official Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Check out the trailer for The Time I Have Left, a time-driven escape adventure with RPG elements that poses an interesting challenge. You have six hours to live... what will you do with that time?

Guide Aline in a race against the clock through a creepy underground complex and face disturbing visions of death along the way in turn-based combat. Uncover the truth buried deep in Colony 7 when The Time I Have Left is released in 2024.

#IGN #gamescom
